ygData.msgSnippet: I m going to go ahead and do something stupid now.  I m going to calm down and be rational.  I realize that no one wants rational but hey since when have I

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

I'm going to go ahead and do something stupid now.  I'm going to calm down 
and be rational.  I realize that no one wants rational but hey since when 
have I cared about what people want to hear.  Facts are in short supply right 
now.  Someone did a terrible thing today.  Blowing the hell out of every 
possible location that caused this is not only impractical because of the 
huge number of possibilities.  It's also stupid.  Do we really want to start 
the next world war?  Entering them to prevent attrocities is one thing but 
causing them is just stupidity taken to an extreme.

--part1_12b.461acf5.28d00fb3_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
